txt_en: Whoever saves one life, saves the world entire.
txt_cn: 当你挽救了一条生命，就等于挽救了全世界。

txt_en: There's nothing easy about grown-up life.
txt_cn: 成年人的生活里没有容易二字。

txt_en: You are braver than you believe.— Winnie the Pooh
txt_cn: 你比你相信的更勇敢。 —《小熊维尼》

txt_en: There will be generations because of what you did.
txt_cn: 因为你的善行，生命才得以传承下去。

txt_en: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
txt_cn: 生命如花，爱情是蜜。

txt_en: Every man is a poet when he is in love.
txt_cn: 每个恋爱中的人都是诗人。

txt_en: A boy's best friend is his mother.
txt_cn: 男孩最好的朋友是他的母亲。

txt_en: To laugh at yourself is to love yourself.
txt_cn: 学会自嘲也是爱自己的一种表现。

txt_en: The only limit is your soul.— Ratatouille
txt_cn: 唯一的限制就是你的灵魂。 —《料理鼠王》

txt_en: The very things that hold you down are going to lift you up. — Dumbo
txt_cn: 让你跌到谷底的事情，往往也是你重新站起的原因。 —《小飞象》

txt_en: Who says my dreams have to stay dreams? — The Little Mermaid
txt_cn: 谁说梦想只能是梦想呢？ —小美人鱼

txt_en: Talent without working hard is nothing.
txt_cn: 没有努力，天份不代表什么。

txt_en: May the Force be with you.
txt_cn: 愿原力与你同在。——《星球大战》

txt_en: You can't handle the truth!
txt_cn: 你不能操纵事实!——《义海雄风》

txt_en: As God is my witness，I'll never be hungry again.
txt_cn: 上帝为我作证，我不会再让自己挨饿了。——《乱世佳人》

txt_en: I have always depended on the kindness of strangers.
txt_cn: 我总是非常依赖陌生人的仁慈。——《欲望号街车》

txt_en: Just keep swimming.
txt_cn: 一直向前游。—《海底总动员》

txt_en: There is no royal road to learning.
txt_cn: 学习没有捷径。

txt_en: Time and tide wait for no man.
txt_cn: 时光如逝水，岁月不待人。

txt_en: Mama says, 'Stupid is as stupid does.'-Forrest Gump, 1994
txt_cn: 妈妈说，‘做傻事的才是傻瓜。'——《阿甘正传，1994》

txt_en: I laugh in the face of danger.
txt_cn: 越危险就越合我心意。

txt_en: It made me look like a duck in water.
txt_cn: 它让我如鱼得水。

txt_en: You just couldn't see an end to that city.
txt_cn: 这个城市似乎没有尽头。

txt_en: I was born on this ship, and the world passed me by.
txt_cn: 我生于船，长与船，世界千变万化。

txt_en: I don't want to survive. I want to live.
txt_cn: 我不要只是生存，我要活得有意义。

txt_en: I'm the king of the world!
txt_cn: 我是世界之王！

txt_en: I feel the need — the need for speed!
txt_cn: 我感觉到一种需要——速度的需要!

txt_en: It's my best friend. Always happy. No questions.
txt_cn: 它是我最好的朋友，总是很快乐，从不问问题。

txt_en: Being yourself is an honor, because nobody else can be you.
txt_cn: 做自己是一种荣耀，因为没有任何人能成为你。
